entry.header: The last business card you'll ever need!
entry.subheader: First impression is the key to success!
entry.text: Get a modern and interactive business card with VortexCards. Showcase your brand in an amazing way and stand out from your competitors!

infoVideo.text: VortexCards is a powerful marketing and search tool that helps you immediately present yourself in a memorable way at the first point of contact and positions you as the only logical choice.
infoVideo.textCon: It's designed to help you connect with high-quality prospects, deliver your marketing message, and engage in conversations that turn into happy customers.

clients.title: Designed to help you earn more
clients.subheader: Get more offers and close more deals when potential clients visit your mini-site.

cta.text: We handle content filling and business card creation.

fullInfo.title: VortexCards provides you these services
fullInfo.subheader: BRAND, POSITION, AND DIFFERENTIATE YOURSELF AT THE FIRST POINT OF CONTACT.

first.title: Smart branding
first.desc: Share your digital business card anywhere

second.title: Engaging design
second.desc: The card makes your brand impactful

fifth.title: Easy contact exchange
fifth.desc: We link your number to your website, exchanging numbers and names verbally is now history.

profit.title: Designed to help you earn more
profit.subheader: Get more offers and close more deals when potential clients visit your mini-site.

first.title: Attract more referrals and clients
first.text: Allow your potential and current clients to send you emails, calls, and text messages with a single button press.

second.title: Connecting with customers becomes easier
second.text: These quick NFC-equipped business cards make information and contact exchange easier and perfect your business.

third.title: Showcase your work effortlessly
third.text: You're probably tired of opening Telegram every time to present your service. These cards contain all the information you want.

first.testimonial: A very useful and necessary product, especially in my work activities, considering the constant meetings and negotiations with partners. I think this is a very relevant solution that matches modern trends and technologies.
